title: Panoptic at Permissionless II

title: Panoptic Releases Smart Contract Code
description: Today marks a significant milestone in Panoptic's ongoing mission to revolutionize DeFi options as we publicly release our smart contract code. This major [milestone](https://panoptic. xyz/docs/gated-launch/launch-roadmap) underscores our commitment to transparency, security, and community involvement.    Can’t wait to explore our code?
